name: XXII Group
goal:
XXII is an intelligence provider, a start-up specialized in Artificial Intelligence and computer vision.
We are building a marketplace of artificial skills that can be personalized, mixed & matched and industrialized, for security and environment purposes.

We are aiming to help educate and simplify what is AI and what it can bring to us to improve our lives.

Our mission is to build tomorrow's tools to augment Human and its senses.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Environment, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
GDPR and data protection compliance
EU work laws
EU trade laws
